overview:
Dave is currently the CEO of Fundly. He was formerly VP of marketing and strategy at Oracle.

Dave has founded 4 companies to date, one of which (ProfitLogic) sold to Oracle, and one of which is Fundly.

Dave has a BA from BYU and and MBA from Harvard Business School.
